# Are you ready to scrape NFL Defensive data with Pandas?

We are going to use Pandas to pull in tables from a URL. 
In this case we will grab NFL Defensive Data for 2020!
source.66655c51: Add your URL with the table below.
source.f71a346f: This script returns HTML tables into a list of DataFrame objects
source.59abe1c6: This means there is one table on the page. To display that first table you insert a 0.
source.5b3f3f20:
Use the read_html method of the Pandas library to read the HTML tables

This script returns HTML tables into a list of DataFrame objects
